SEARCH
Package Enquiry

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
Enquiry.Enquiry
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntity
public class Enquiry extends Object implements IEntity
The Enquiry class represents an enquiry submitted by an applicant regarding a BTO project. Each enquiry includes metadata such as the date, project name, applicant NRIC, message, and status (e.g., PENDING or REPLIED).

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryId, LocalDate date, String projectName, String applicantNric, String message)
      Constructs a new enquiry with default status set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the unique ID of the enquiry
      date - the date the enquiry was submitted
      projectName - the name of the project the enquiry is about
      applicantNric - the NRIC of the applicant submitting the enquiry
      message - the enquiry message content

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryId, LocalDate date, String projectName, String applicantNric, String message, EnquiryStatus status)
      Constructs an enquiry with an explicitly provided status.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the enquiry ID
      date - the date of the enquiry
      projectName - the project name
      applicantNric - the applicant's NRIC
      message - the enquiry message
      status - the enquiry status

      public boolean isReplied()
      Checks if the enquiry has been replied to.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry status is REPLIED, false otherwise

    • toCSVRow

      public String toCSVRow()
      Converts the enquiry to a CSV-compatible string. Commas in the message are replaced with semicolons to preserve format.
      Specified by:
      toCSVRow in interface IEntity
      Returns:
      the CSV row representation of the enquiry
